text:
November 16, 1956
Hr. Maurice F, Seay
Director of Education
tf. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Maurice:
It would be a great pleasure to have you with us anytime from
December 18th to 20th. *. ank is out of town at the moment,
but I believe he will also be available at that time. Certainly
the rest of us will be, and will be pleased to show you our
facilities and operations.
May we help you with reservations? Please let us know of any
way we can be of help.
Sincerely,
HJS/mfb
ccs F. Schooley ^
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
